issue.title: Display metdata title in page title
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Can we add the metadata title in page (html/head) title ?

Currently only the catalog name is displayed (if available, otherwise site name is displayed).

Maybe a pattern like : <catalog_title OR site_name> - <metadata _title> .

What do you think ?

(PS: we have metadata title XPath available from component configuration)

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Set as "enhancement" since it's not a real new feature.

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Metadata title should be extract from the XML and that could only be done with a js drive from the XSL.
